system.description: Forever tainted in body and soul by their unholy experience; possessing unique knowledge of the Enemy Beyond, they make for excellent—if never fully trusted—servants of the Inquisition. A mortal possessed by a Daemon is torment made flesh. Freed from the shackles of subservience to a Daemonic master, the Exorcised often finds himself bound by lifelong service to a new cause.
system.bonusDescription: An Exorcised character counts his Insanity bonus as 2 higher for purposes of avoiding Fear tests. Additionally, he can never again become possessed by the same Daemon that once possessed him.
